headline: Show HN: Easy Amazon EC2 Instance Comparison
description:
Hi everyone,

My name's Kaveh: I'm the founder of www.usage.ai

EC2 Pricing: https://ec2pricing.usage.ai/

I thought the previous generation of EC2 Pricing Pages were getting quite slow and a bit buggy. So, I'm excited to announce that we launched a free, new EC2 pricing page for the community.

Do you often look up EC2 Pricing? Would love to hear your thoughts direct: kaveh@usage.ai
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 简单的亚马逊EC2实例比较
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 簡單的亞馬遜EC2實例比較
description_zh-Hans:
大家好，

我叫Kaveh。我是www.usage.ai

EC2定价的创始人：https://ec2pricing.usage.ai/

我认为上一代的EC2定价页变得相当慢，而且有点小毛病。因此，我很高兴地宣布，我们为社区推出了一个免费的、新的EC2定价页面。

你经常查询EC2定价吗？很想直接听到你的想法：kaveh@usage.ai
